com.jackstockley.addressbookrest

Class PersonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackstockley.addressbookrest.PersonController

  • @Path(value="person")
public class PersonController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the RESTful side of the person object
    Version:
    2.00
    Author:
    jackstockley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPeople()
      Returns JSON for all the people in the database or status code 204 if no people in databse
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSimilarPeople(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String data)
      Returns JSON for all the people in the database with similar field and data or status code 204 if no similar people
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSingularPerson(int id)
      Returns JSON for a singular person in the database or 204 if no person matches the id
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response insertPerson(Person person)
      Allows user to sumbit a PUT reuest to create a new person on the database
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response removePerson(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String data)
      Allows user to submit a DELETE request to delete a person on the databse
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updatePerson(int id, Person person)
      Allows user to sumbit a POST request to update a person on the database

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPeople

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllPeople()
        Returns JSON for all the people in the database or status code 204 if no people in databse
        Returns:
        Resposne with either 200, 204, or 500

      • getSimilarPeople

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="{field}/{data}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSimilarPeople(@PathParam(value="field")
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String field,
                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="data")
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String data)
        Returns JSON for all the people in the database with similar field and data or status code 204 if no similar people
        Parameters:
        field - Field to match data with
        data - Similar data between people
        Returns:
        Response with either 200, 204, or 500

      • getSingularPerson

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSingularPerson(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                  int id)
        Returns JSON for a singular person in the database or 204 if no person matches the id
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the person to be returned
        Returns:
        Response with either 200, 204, or 500

      • updatePerson

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="update/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updatePerson(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                          int id,
                                                                                                                                                          Person person)
        Allows user to sumbit a POST request to update a person on the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the person to be updated
        person - The new person that will replace the current person
        Returns:
        Response 200 and new person if updated otherwise 500

      • insertPerson

        @PUT
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="insert/")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response insertPerson(Person person)
        Allows user to sumbit a PUT reuest to create a new person on the database
        Parameters:
        person - The new person to be added
        Returns:
        Response 200 and new person if added otherwise 500

      • removePerson

        @DELETE
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="remove/{field}/{data}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removePerson(@PathParam(value="field")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String field,
                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="data")
                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String data)
        Allows user to submit a DELETE request to delete a person on the databse
        Parameters:
        field - The field to match with the person
        data - Data of matchin field in person
        Returns:
        Response with JSON saying removed: true otherwise 500
